metadata.name: Berry Crush
metadata.description:
Fused with bright, deep, vibrant colours and hundreds of dots and splattered paint and ink.

A key element in my work is to evoke an emotion through the use of colour and a range of mark-making techniques. When we experience the beauty in nature we are often left feeling in awe of its magnificence. I also believe it takes us into a reflective state and acts as a form of meditation- away from the noise, pressures and anxieties we face on a daily basis. I use dots to create movement and to show natureâ€™s beauty and how it possesses an inexhaustible vitality and the promise of infinity. 

Title. Berry Crush
Series. Colour Drop
Size. 4961 x 7123
